AContent Documentation

Most of the AContent documentation is found within AContent itself in the AContent Handbook included with each AContent installation. Follow the link in the footer area of each AContent installation to find the handbook. Or, follow the context sensitive help for direct links to the handbook while using a tool in AContent.

Documentation for AContent 1.4

Another larger HD version of this video is available at YouTube

AContent Lesson Cartridges

Download the following Common Cartridges and import them into AContent for additional documentation, and for sample content.
